proper noun.description: The ancient kingdom of the Moabites, east of the Dead Sea.

noun.description: A very powerful aerial bomb, developed by the US military, that has a satellite guidance system and is designed to cause damage to a large area.
examples: the MOAB was dropped from the rear door of an MC-130 cargo plane

origin: Early 21st century: from the initial letters of Massive Ordnance Air Blast. It is also commonly referred to as the Mother of All Bombs (see the mother of all ——).
